games.title: Sumo Fury
games.description: Dive into the thrilling world of Sumo Fury, where you can acquire powerful wrestlers with superior stats and challenge rivals globally. Show your mastery in combat, earn in-game currency through victories, and unlock stronger fighters to dominate the arena. Achieve glory and wealth with each victory, the excitement of Sumo Fury is sure to captivate you!
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:  
    Movement:  Arrow keys (← ↑ → ↓)  
    Punch:  Z  
    Kick:  X  
    Defend:  C  
    Jump:  Spacebar

Mobile Controls:  
    Movement:  Virtual Joystick [Joystick Image]  
    Actions:  Tap corresponding buttons

games.title: Little Big Fighters
games.description: Little Big Fighters is an exciting action game set in a lively survival arena where players must showcase their combat skills to rise through the ranks. Accessible via browsers on desktop and mobile, it offers a seamless experience without downloads or registration, focusing on battles and strategic growth.
games.howToPlayText:
Left Mouse Button = Move
Click = Fight a boss
L = Unlock the mouse
